CHAT.comment: Home Visit 4; Chi sits at one end of table , MOT sits perpendicular
Book Reading to mother; The Very Hungry Caterpillar

context notes say Chi points to words as he reads; sometimes Chi guesses a wrong word based on the first letter; Mot points out the word is wrong and then Chi can read the word himself; despite one sarcastic comment from Chi in reaction to positive feedback from Mot , the task seems enjoyable to all involved , even though Chi has some shortcomings as a reader

u.a: MOT was going to correct Chi , but decides not to
points to word little on page
follows along with finger while reading
Chi's reaction to Mot's praise is slightly sarcastic
Chi has trouble separating pages , MOT helps hold page
points to words to help Chi read
MOT points to again for Chi to read since Chi skipped it the first time
Chi sounds out the word quietly before saying it
Chi sounds out the word before saying it
